name: Invertigo - Team 21
description:
Use the power of inverting gravity to escape the laboratory whilst avoiding evil scientists, dangerous robot/animal fusions, spikes and acid pools!

Game Controls:

Move right = Right Arrow Key

Move left = Left Arrow Key

Gravity Up = Z key

Gravity Down = X key

Credits:

Tahmid Alam - Background Artist, Level Designer, Sound effects.

Owain Thomas - Sprite Artist, Programmer, Level Designer.

Ross Davey - Programmer.

Music used: Jeroen Tel's '1999' Extended Mix by Jack Parkin
